faqs.question: What are your hours?
faqs.answer:
We're here to help Monday through Friday, 9 AM – 6 PM EST! 🕒

Need immediate assistance outside these hours? Type 'contact' and we’ll reach out as soon as we're back online and see your message!

Great question! Our pricing is customized based on your needs:

💼 Starter: $49/mo (up to 5 clients)
🚀 Agency: $149/mo (unlimited clients)
⚡ Enterprise: Custom (white-glove support)

Want a personalized quote? Just type 'contact' or 'demo'!
faqs.question: What are your prices?

faqs.answer:
You're already in one! 🎉 This is our live demo chatbot.

Want to see how it works for YOUR business? I can set up a personalized demo. Just let me know your name and email, and we'll get you started!
faqs.question: Can I try a demo?

faqs.answer:
Here's what makes us special:

✅ White-label branding (your logo, colors)
✅ Conversational lead collection
✅ Multi-client management
✅ One-line embed on any website
✅ Analytics & reporting
✅ 24/7 availability

Want to learn more about a specific feature? Just ask!
faqs.question: What features do you offer?

faqs.answer: I'd love to connect you with our team! Let me collect a few quick details so someone can reach out. What's your name?
faqs.question: How can I contact you?

faqs.answer:
Super easy! Just 3 steps:

1️⃣ Copy one line of code
2️⃣ Paste it before </body> on your site
3️⃣ Done! ✅

The whole process takes about 2 minutes. Want to see the exact code? Type 'embed code'!
faqs.question: How do I set it up?

faqs.answer:
We've got your back! All plans include:

📧 Email support (24hr response)
💬 Live chat during business hours
📚 Documentation & video tutorials

Agency & Enterprise plans also get priority support and onboarding calls!
faqs.question: What kind of support do you provide?

faqs.answer:
Absolutely! You control:

🎨 Colors (primary & secondary)
🖼️ Logo & bot avatar
💬 Bot name & personality
✍️ All messages & responses

It's 100% white-label — zero mention of us anywhere!
